title: Health
cleaned_text: Newborn Screening The Tennessee Newborn screening program was designed to screen infants shortly after birth for over 70 treatable conditions. The Tennessee Newborn screening program was designed to screen infants shortly after birth for over 70 treatable conditions. September 10-16, 2023 Free Flu Shots 11.01.23 #FightFlu23 September is Newborn Screening Awareness Month. Tennessee Health Commissioner Dr. Ralph Alvarado shares the importance of early detection and intervention. Click [here](https://www.tn.gov/health/health-program-areas/newborn-screening.html) to learn more.
